Study Title: The Comparison of XELOX and EOX in the First-line Treatment of Advanced Gastric Cancer
Brief Summary: This study is designed to compare the efficacy and safety of XELOX regimen with EOX regimen in the first-line treatment of advanced gastric cancer patients.
Secondary Outcome Measures: overall survival, 10 months|overall response rate, 2 months|Number of Participants with Adverse Events, 2 months|quality of life questionnaire, 2 months
Study Design: Allocation: RANDOMIZED|Intervention Model: PARALLEL|Masking: NONE|Primary Purpose: TREATMENT
Locations: Fudan University Cancer Hospital, ShangHai, Shanghai, 200032, China
